Chapter 1.question: In Kotlin, what is the keyword used to declare a variable that can be modified after it is initialized?
Which of the following is true about Kotlin's type inference?
options: It is mandatory to specify the data type of a variable.
It can automatically infer the data type of a variable.
Type inference is not supported in Kotlin.
Type inference can only be used for function parameters.
Chapter 1.correct_answer: It can automatically infer the data type of a variable.
